title: Image Analysis Competency Enhancement Course Through Radiology Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational radiology theory and understanding of image interpretation
context.additional_context: Emphasizing collaborative learning environments for real-life problem-solving, optimized for smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify errors in radiographic images with over 80% precision through a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach
Learners can provide three or more clinical reasoning justifications when analyzing radiographic images through group activities
After six months of learning, image analysis competency shows statistically significant improvement in pre-post assessments

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., KakaoTalk Group Chat)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
